ygData.subject: Re: For the Friday Trip and msg to Zanderion
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah Ziltus... i had the same connection probs..even though i got back soon..and sereph led me to oasis (thanks  sereph!)..i was suffering from like 20-40%
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah Ziltus...
i had the same connection probs..even though i got back soon..and sereph led
me to
oasis (thanks sereph!)..i was suffering from like 20-40% packet loss and
seeing SGs shaking
their butts around me...i decided to call it a nite and gate back..hehe

Think i'll try hunting caimans and mummies and watever not again tonite!
Hope
everything's better and that i can find my way back to oasis again....

p.s. what isp u use? cyberway?

Zanderion

----- Original Message -----
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 9:08 AM
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] For the Friday Trip and msg to Zanderion


> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>
> Kal and Zan had followed FF and me back to FP last night, so I dun think
> they can join u, hehe.
>
> Before that FF and I wander for one hr in LF and couldnt find the wasp
> Sereph mentioned. Maybe we will go back again when we reach lvl 24.
>
> I'm not sure abt others but when FF and I was on our way to HH hunting, I
> got LD and unable to login until I tried again in an hr time. When I
login
> FF is not ard so I bought myself 320 sets of smithing stuffs. H/w, my
> connection is very lag when I try to purchase the ingredients. In the end
I
> feel so sian and logout at the smith shop.
>
> Tonight I will smith until vomit blood again, hopefully can reach skill 90
> or even master stage. Unless u guys got something interesting and
fruitful
> to hunt, u can count me out tonight, hehe.
>
> Ziltus (6th circle high-elf wizard, master brewer and half-f**k smith)
>
>
>

> wrote:
> > Woohoo!made level9,now finally got spells!BTW kalandra friday night u
> want to go kill the watever level10 mob with me [the sereph ask one]?b4 we

> could come along and join us :P
> >
